name: tag_line
description: A short tag line text that appears above the main heading.

name: heading
description: The main heading that describes the company, product, or service.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The text for the call-to-action button.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that the user will be directed to when clicking the button.

name: paragraph
description: A two-sentence paragraph detailing the company, product, or service we are showcasing.

name: image
description: An image showing a company or product visualization.
